issue.subject: easySDI user is not correctly loaded in Orders and requests list views
issue.description:
When an order is treated, the created_by field which is Joomla user id, is replaced by sdiUser id.

When list views orders or requests are loaded, the Joomla user can not be correctly loaded and a PHP warning is raised.

details.name: subject
details.old_value: easySDI user is not correctly loaded in basket
details.new_value: easySDI user is not correctly loaded in Orders and requests list views

details.name: description
details.old_value: When loading the informations of an extraction in the basket, the field 'created_by' is not correctly filled because sdiUser is not correctly loaded.
details.new_value:
When an order is treated, the created_by field which is Joomla user id, is replaced by sdiUser id.

When list views orders or requests are loaded, the Joomla user can not be correctly loaded and a PHP warning is raised.
